name: Pirate Crush - Match 3 Games
description:
Welcome to Pirate Crush!
Help Bonny the pirates to explore unknown lands and seas in this addictive and exciting match-3 games.
Collect treasures, open chests and complete all tasks to unlock ever more challenges through her journey.

What are you waitng for? Ready to sail now!

The game features:
● Well known and simple game mechanics
● Beautiful design with cute character
● Exciting match-3 levels: tons of fun, featuring unique power-ups and elements
● Can play anytime, anywhere
● Does not require a network connection
● Easy to play, just swap and match 3 or more pieces of the same color
● Suitable for all every age
● New levels are added continuously through update

And more Pirate features we'll let you discover it by yourself while playing one of the best puzzle games.
Download this game today and enjoy. Ahoy!
